text:
Requests to the ServletRequest.getRemoteAddr() always returns 1267.0.0.1 in the
current 3.3 code (including a build from lastest source 7 days ago)  This is a
bug.  It should return the IPv4 address of the requesting machine.  The correct
bevahiour is obtained by using 3.2.2 or 4.0b5.

I'll try the nightly source and rebuild to see if the problem goes away and
update the bug with the information.
creator: reichhold@singingfish.com

text:
Tried several builds and still get 127.0.0.1 for requests from remote boxes.  
This call works correctly for all other versions of tomcat.  This is a spec 
compliance issue.

Marked it as duplicate ( 2788 has a better subject )

The problem is (almost) resolved, Henri has a fix. Thanks for the report !
